hooks.command: jq -r '[(.tool_input.command | split("\n")[0] | if length > 50 then .[:50] + "..." else . end), (if .cwd then (.cwd | split("/") | last) else (.transcript_path | split("/") | .[-2] | split("-") | .[-2:] | join("-")) end)] | @tsv' | while IFS=$'\t' read cmd proj; do osascript -e "display notification \"${cmd}\" with title \"Claude Code [$proj]\" subtitle \"명령을 실행하였습니다\" sound name \"Glass\""; done

jq -r 'if .cwd then (.cwd | split("/") | last) else (.transcript_path | split("/") | .[-2] | split("-") | .[-2:] | join("-")) end' | xargs -I {} osascript -e 'display notification "승인이 필요합니다" with title "Claude Code [{}]" sound name "Basso"'
